name: MultiRes
description:
Allows you to set 3 different screen settings under the general settings tab. 
 
Changelog - v2.3.1
 [indent]- Fixed an issue where the stat popup appears behind the pause menu. [/indent]
 [indent]- Ty lx and Nodoka for reporting the issue![/indent]

Changelog - v2.3.0
 [indent]- Updated for Brotato v1.1.0.1 [/indent]

Changelog - v2.2.0
 [indent]- Updated for the new ModLoader version. [/indent]
 [indent]- Added compatibility for an upcoming character. [/indent]

 Changelog - v2.1.1 
 [indent]- Added a min height and width for the expand setting, but still switch the screen stretch to expand. 
 This should fix the very zoomed in camera on the Steam Deck. [/indent]

 Changelog - v2.1.0 
 [indent]- Removed the check for minimum width, so setting to expand should work now for everyone. [/indent]
